text: Erich Stojaspal (15 March 1929 in Vienna- 30 March 2010) was an Austrian footballer. He played as forward mainly for FK Austria Wien. ==Career == He started playing football in Simmering with the local club Ostbahn XI. In 1943 he moved to FK Austria Wien. He played with good success as a left winger. However, he was mostly used in the reserve team. In the summer of 1955 he left Austria and moved to Simmeringer SC. He ended his career in 1960. He was the younger brother of Ernst Stojaspal. title: Erich Stojaspal
